statements: SELECT * FROM crime_statistics WHERE crime_type = 'Theft'
SELECT incident_date, crime_type FROM crime_statistics WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT id, incident_location FROM crime_statistics ORDER BY incident_date DESC
SELECT crime_description FROM crime_statistics WHERE crime_type = 'Assault' AND incident_location LIKE '%Park%'
SELECT id, crime_type FROM crime_statistics WHERE crime_type IN ('Robbery', 'Burglary')
SELECT * FROM crime_statistics WHERE crime_type = 'Theft' ORDER BY incident_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT incident_location, COUNT(*) AS total_incidents FROM crime_statistics GROUP BY incident_location ORDER BY total_incidents DESC
SELECT crime_type, AVG(id) AS average_id FROM crime_statistics GROUP BY crime_type ORDER BY average_id DESC
SELECT id, incident_date, crime_description FROM crime_statistics WHERE incident_date > '2022-01-01' AND incident_date < '2022-12-31'
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT crime_type) AS total_crime_types, MAX(id) AS max_id FROM crime_statistics
SELECT * FROM crimes WHERE crime_type = 'Theft' ORDER BY crime_date DESC;
SELECT crime_id, crime_type, crime_location FROM crimes WHERE crime_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM crimes INNER JOIN incident_reports ON crimes.crime_location = incident_reports.report_location;
SELECT crime_type, COUNT(*) AS total_crimes FROM crimes GROUP BY crime_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT DISTINCT crime_location FROM crimes ORDER BY crime_location ASC;
SELECT * FROM crimes WHERE crime_type = 'Theft' ORDER BY crime_date DESC, crime_location ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT crime_type, COUNT(*) AS crime_count FROM crimes GROUP BY crime_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY crime_count DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT crime_location FROM crimes WHERE crime_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT crime_type, DATE_PART('month', crime_date) AS crime_month FROM crimes WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM crime_date) = 2022 ORDER BY crime_month ASC;
SELECT * FROM incident_reports WHERE report_description ILIKE '%assault%' AND report_location = 'Downtown' ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM CrimeStatistics
SELECT crime_type, crime_date FROM CrimeStatistics WHERE location='City Center'
SELECT crime_id, description FROM CrimeStatistics WHERE crime_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT location, count(*) AS total_crimes FROM CrimeStatistics GROUP BY location
SELECT * FROM IncidentReports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM CrimeStatistics WHERE crime_type = 'Theft' ORDER BY crime_date DESC;
SELECT crime_date, location, description FROM IncidentReports WHERE incident_type = 'Assault' ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_crimes FROM CrimeAnalysis WHERE location = 'Downtown';
SELECT crime_id, crime_type, location, description FROM CrimeStatistics WHERE crime_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY crime_id;
SELECT MAX(analysis_date) AS latest_analysis_date, MIN(analysis_date) AS earliest_analysis_date FROM CrimeAnalysis;
SELECT * FROM crimes;
SELECT crime_type, location, date_reported FROM crimes WHERE crime_id = 1;
SELECT description, report_date FROM incident_reports WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT name, age, gender FROM suspects WHERE crime_id = 3 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT analysis_id, analyst_name, analysis_date, findings FROM crime_analysis;
SELECT * FROM crimes WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY date_reported DESC;
SELECT crime_type, COUNT(*) as num_crimes FROM crimes GROUP BY crime_type HAVING num_crimes > 1 ORDER BY num_crimes DESC;
SELECT c.crime_id, c.crime_type, s.name as suspect_name, sa.analyst_name FROM crimes c JOIN suspects s ON c.crime_id = s.crime_id JOIN crime_analysis sa ON c.crime_id = sa.crime_id;
SELECT * FROM incident_reports WHERE location = 'Chicago' AND report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM incident_reports ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM CrimeReports;
SELECT report_id, report_date, report_location, description FROM CrimeReports;
SELECT report_id, crime_type, report_date, report_location FROM CrimeReports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM CrimeStatistics WHERE total_reports > 10;
SELECT crime_type, arrest_count, crime_rate FROM CrimeStatistics WHERE crime_rate > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM CrimeReports WHERE crime_type = 'Robbery';
SELECT report_date, report_location, description FROM CrimeReports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM CrimeStatistics ORDER BY crime_rate DESC;
SELECT suspect_name, age, gender FROM Suspects WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age > 30;
SELECT witness_name, statement FROM Witnesses WHERE witness_name LIKE '%John%';
